attributes.action: instruct Chelsea to ban Didier Drogba from Stamford Bridge for life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following a recent coin throwing incident at Villa Park, Aston Villa FC made a public commitment to find the culprit and ban them for life from Villa Park. It therefore seems only fair that the Prime Minister instruct Chelsea to put in place a lifetime ban for Dider Drogba at their ground given the clear video evidence of him throwing a coin on Wednesday 12th November at Stamford Bridge.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
